subtitle: Aprenda a programar e pilotar um drone Papagaio no Swift!

additionalInformation.value: Inglês, alemão, francês, japonês, chinês simplificado e espanhol da América Latina.
additionalInformation.name: Idiomas:

title: Parrot Template
description:
This template is the starting point for your own drone project. You will be able to use all the commands you learned in the Parrot Education playground to program and pilot your Parrot drone.

Supported drone models include: Rolling Spider, Airborne, and Mambo.
